abstract: NHL suspends Washington Capitals forward Marcus Johansson for two games suspension for illegal hit on New York Islanders defenseman Thomas Hickey.
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. suspended Washington Capitals forward Marcus Johansson for two games for a hit to the head of Islanders defenseman Thomas Hickey.
snippet: The N.H.L. suspended Washington Capitals forward Marcus Johansson for two games for a hit to the head of Islanders defenseman Thomas Hickey.
